rows.label: tlk001001_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Thank you all for your assistance in
Acedia.

rows.label: tlk001001_04_msg0002
rows.name:
With your help, I was able to fulfill my
duty as was expected of me.

rows.label: tlk001001_04_msg0003
rows.name:
I trust you will take good care of
Special Inquisitor Meleph and Kagutsuchi.

rows.label: tlk001001_04_msg0004
rows.name:
I, too, believe that the hopes and
dreams of Alst rest on the success
of the Holy Grail's pilgrimage.

rows.label: tlk001001_04_msg0005
rows.name:
You don't need to worry about us.
Please, dear sister, continue your
journey.

rows.label: tlk001001_04_msg0006
rows.name:
I can see it in your eyes. You look more
alive than you ever have been before.

rows.label: tlk001001_04_msg0007
rows.name:
I confess, I am almost a little jealous
of Rex-san.

rows.label: tlk001001_04_msg0008
rows.name:
Ha ha ha... Well, in any case,
I wish you a safe journey.
